description:
http://anidb.net/ch13449 [Rally Cheyenne]`s sister, apparently 2-4 years younger than Rally (judging by their appearance when they were kids).
Like Rally she`s a half-breed human / http://anidb.net/ch25718 [Lucifer Hawk]. She suffers from an inferiority complex, urging her to get rid of her eternal "younger sister" image at any cost - even by killing Rally if necessary.
name: Rosa Cheyenne
